name: Super Moon | Pre-Alpha |
description:
Super Moon

========

Super Moon is a game which you have to kill all the Dark Monsters cause they want to absorb the light. This game is a Pre-Alpha cause I'm planning to add more things and features.

========

★ Instructions ★

    » Move with arrows keys, wasd, or mobile friendly!

    » Shoot with spacebar or click on player

    » Avoid Dark Monsters

========

★About ★

   » If you don't kill a Dark Monster, the world will 

      became darker and darker... until everything is dark 

      and there is no light. Also, when you collect a star 

      you get 5+ points!

========

★ Stats ★

   » Cointains Highscore: [Last reset 28/12/21]

   » Block Count

   » Sprites Count

========

★ Easter Egg ★

      » You can find an easter egg?

========

★ Credits ★

   » Sounds - @Quaxx& @KIKOKO_

   » Music - Alan Walker Energy

   » Art: @madrid2030

   » Code: @madrid2030

   » HP Bar Tutorial: @mGR8T [Edited by me]

========

★ HP Bar ★

   » When a Dark Monster touches you or the edge, it will 

      subtract -10 of light. If the light goes to 0, it'll respawn 

      to the main menu.

========

★ Bugs & Glitches ★

    » If you find bugs, please let me know by leaving a Kind 

        and respectful coment!

========
